Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2357 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.15-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2357 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.15-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libreswan is earlier than 4.15-1, affected by CVE-2024-2357
